projects.title: Customer Analysis Dashboard
projects.subtitle: Tableau | Responsive Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Tableau dashboard for analyzing customer data and generating actionable insights with dynamic data integration and interactive visualizations.
projects.detailed_description: This project involved creating a sophisticated customer analysis dashboard using Tableau that provides comprehensive insights into customer behavior and business metrics. The dashboard integrates multiple data sources and provides real-time analytics capabilities.
features: Integrated dynamic data sources including databases and CSV files
Created interactive visualizations: bar charts, line charts, scatter plots, and heatmaps
Implemented responsive design for multi-device accessibility
Conducted customer segmentation and purchasing behavior analysis
Identified key trends and business improvement opportunities

projects.title: Mobile App for Lottery Addiction Analysis
projects.subtitle: R Programming | Data Analysis and Visualization
projects.description: Developed a mobile application to analyze and visualize user behavior patterns related to lottery addiction using comprehensive R programming and statistical analysis.
projects.detailed_description: This innovative mobile application combines data science with mobile development to address the serious issue of lottery addiction. The app uses advanced R programming techniques to analyze user behavior and provide insights into addiction patterns.
features: Analyzed user behavior patterns related to lottery addiction
Integrated R and RStudio for comprehensive data analysis
Utilized tidyverse package for data manipulation and cleaning
Implemented sets package for advanced set operations
Created interactive visualizations for user insights
Conducted statistical analyses on user demographics and addiction correlation
